## ChildRelation interface

A one to many relationship child

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChildRelation<TState> 
```

|  [cascadeDelete?](./state-model.childrelation.cascadedelete.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if children should be deleted when parents are. |
